com.cisco.dvbu.ps.deploytool.gui.core.module.trigger

Class Trigger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cisco.dvbu.ps.deploytool.gui.core.module.trigger.Trigger

  • public class Trigger
extends java.lang.Object

    Bean object for trigger module schedule records. Intended to be serialized/deserialized by Jackson into/from JSON.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Calvin Goodrich

      • setFromTimeInADay

        public void setFromTimeInADay(int fromTimeInADay)

        Sets the fromTimeInADay field.

        Parameters:
        fromTimeInADay - The start of the recurring restriction window. In minutes from midnight, i.e.: 60 = 1AM, 720 = noon. Set to -1 when recurring restriction is false.

      • getFromTimeInADay

        public int getFromTimeInADay()

        Returns the value of the id field.

        Returns:
        The value.

      • setEndTimeInADay

        public void setEndTimeInADay(int endTimeInADay)

        Sets the endTimeInADay field.

        Parameters:
        endTimeInADay - The end of the recurring restriction window. In minutes from midnight, i.e.: 60 = 1AM, 720 = noon. Set to -1 when recurring restriction is false.

      • getEndTimeInADay

        public int getEndTimeInADay()

        Returns the value of the endTimeInADay field.

        Returns:
        The value.

      • setRecurringDay

        public void setRecurringDay(int recurringDay)

        Sets the recurringDay field.

        Parameters:
        recurringDay - Days in which the recurring window occurs. Set to -1 when recurring restriction is false. Value is sum of bits representing days, i.e. Sunday = 1, Monday = 2, Tuesday = 4, Wednesday = 8, etc. Sunday + Tuesday + Wednesday = 13.

      • getRecurringDay

        public int getRecurringDay()

        Returns the value of the recurringDay field.

        Returns:
        The value.

      • setIsCluster

        public void setIsCluster(boolean isCluster)

        Sets the isCluster field.

        Parameters:
        isCluster - Indicates whether the trigger should fire only once per cluster (true) or that each in the cluster should fire the trigger.

      • isIsCluster

        public boolean isIsCluster()

        Returns the value of the isCluster field.

        Returns:
        The value.
